name: Lightning Rod
description:
While this status is active, can be triggered once: DMG received by the attached character from Thunder Manifestation or its summons is increased by 1.
(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of Thunder Manifestation's skills will target the character to which this is attached.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>While this status is active, can be triggered once:</color> DMG received by the attached character from $[A2402] or its summons is increased by 1.\n(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of $[A2402]'s skills will target the character to which this is attached.)
